  physical_appearance: \Graffiti no.1 has figural representations; that of a clothed person to the left
 and a bare bodied one in the central panel. The central figure is drawn through a worm-hole perspective
 and shows him/her with two large perky breasts with legs in an open stance. There are arrows pointing to each breast
 as well as the intimate area of the figure. The words \\you fool I want girl not men like you pondans\\ are written on the central panel

  subject_terms_1: while the words \\i love you\\ and \\suck\\ are found on the flanking panels. \ forms of expression (artistic concept)  self-expression  identity  scratch art
